item.item_calculator_crafting.name: 合成計算器
item.item_calculator_math.name: 數學計算器
jecalculation.command.help.list: 以下是可用的指令列表：
jecalculation.chat.max_loop: 抱歉，在1000次運算中，計算機並未收斂。如果你認為此程式有結果，請聯絡開發者。
jecalculation.chat.server_mode: 模組未在客戶端工作，因此你不能在沒有計算機的情況下開啟介面
jecalculation.gui.craft.help: 歡迎來到本模組的主介面。建議您首先使用右上角的兩個按鈕來導入配方以便後續的配方創建與編輯。當配方被記錄後，計算方可開始。若要算出某件物品的製作耗材，只需從JEI中選取目標物品並拖入介面左上角的欄位中，並逐個紀錄配方疊代。計算的結果將顯示在介面下方的欄位中。結果欄位上方的四個按鈕分別提供了配方的輸入總覽顯示、輸出總覽顯示、催化劑（如工作檯、合金爐、扳手等參與合成或提供合成環境但不消耗的物品）總覽顯示以及合成步驟總覽顯示。左上方的按鈕允許你加入及編輯「標籤」。「標籤」是本模組的重要組成部分，它在計算中指代著所有配方的參與者。配方中牽扯到的物品、流體、礦物辭典，甚至只是一個占位符，都以一個個「標籤」的形式參與JEC合成計算器的計算。只要操作正確，本模組定將助您一臂之力。
jecalculation.gui.craft.title: 合成計算機
jecalculation.gui.craft.label: 添加標籤
jecalculation.gui.math.title:
數學計算器
jecalculation.gui.math.help=軟硬鍵盤均可用以操縱數學計算器。兩者按鈕的對應關係如下：
- 加：=或+鍵
- 減：-或_鍵
- 乘：'或"鍵
- 除：/或?鍵
- 等於：Enter鍵
- 清除：Delete鍵
- 回刪：Backspace鍵
jecalculation.gui.disamb.label: Inferred types
jecalculation.gui.recipe.save.disabled: 無法保存配方\n您可能已保存過該配方\n或該配方非法
jecalculation.gui.recipe.copy.disabled: 無法另存為新配方\n您可能已保存過同樣的配方\n或配方並未改動
jecalculation.gui.recipe.label: Add label
jecalculation.gui.recipe.confirm.disable: 不能使用空的字符串當成名字
jecalculation.gui.recipe.disamb.disabled: Disambiguation settings are only\navailable when transferring recipes\nwith multiple options from JEI
jecalculation.gui.recipe.title: 配方修改中
jecalculation.gui.recipe.help: This interface allows you to create or edit recipes. To create one recipe, you can pick items from the JEI item list, then put it into the slots. When finished, simply click the save button. You can also fast transer recipes from JEI by clicking "+" when openning recipe view.\fTo edit one label, you can simply click it, then a toolbar will pop up to help you, where you can switch between amount and percentage mode, type the amount, or remove the label. In addition, you can use mouse scroll to quickly change the amount. Clicking the "Clear" button will remove all of the labels.\fUsing recipe fast transfer, some labels will automatically setup for you, like oreDict labels. If you do not want this behavoir, simply use "Disambiguous" button to select manually. You can also add labels by ckicking the "Add label" button. By the way, normally you shouldn't put fuzzy labels as output.\fYou can easily manage recipes using groups. Click the "New group" button, type the group name and hit the tick, you are done. The new group name will show in the top bar. If you already have groups set up and you want to use an existing one, you can use the arrows to select between them.\fWhen you are editing an existing recipe, you will have two extra buttons, "Save as" and "Delete". "Save as" allows you to save the current recipe as a new recipe, without changing the existing one. "Delete" simply allows you to delete the recipe.
jecalculation.gui.label.title: 標籤編輯中
jecalculation.gui.label.help: This interface allows you to create labels. This mod provides 4 types of labels: fluid, oreDict, placeholder and item. To create fluid and oreDict label, you can just search and pick. Item labels represent an item stack, but with fuzzy options for meta, nbt and capalibity.\fAs is indicated by the name, Placeholder labels do not hold any content. It is just a string to connect recipes. You can use it for anything, like structure or event energy. To create one, simply type in the name, then hit the tick. You can also search and pick from existing ones.
jecalculation.gui.search.export_group: 從現在這個群組導出配方
jecalculation.gui.search.export_all.disa: 不能導出因為沒有配方被記錄
jecalculation.gui.search.title: 配方管理
jecalculation.gui.search.help: This interface allows you to search, import and export recipes. Simply click the item to edit or delete the recipe. The two buttons in upper left will be helpful if you want to import or export recipes.
jecalculation.gui.search.rename.disabled: Rename options only available\nwhen one group selected
jecalculation.gui.search.confirm.disable: New name cannot be empty\nor the same as existing ones
jecalculation.gui.import.title: 輸入物品配方
jecalculation.gui.import.help: This interface allows you to import recipes. First place exported data files into "config/JustEnoughCalculation/data/", then you will see them in the list organized as "filename/group" if there is no error (otherwise check the log). Use the buttons to select recipe groups to import and hit the tick, then you are done.\fFor pack makers or server owners, you can rename the data file and place it at "config/JustEnoughCalculation/default.json" to set it as default. When player creates world or joins server, the default recipes will be automatically setup for the user.
jecalculation.gui.import.confirm.disable: 不能輸入因為沒有選擇記錄
jecalculation.gui.import.tick.selected: 點擊取消選擇一個群組
jecalculation.gui.item_stack.confirm.dis: 不能創建因為沒有被選擇的物品
jecalculation.label.ore_dict.name: 礦物: %s
jecalculation.label.placeholder.name: Placeholder: %s
